name: Juice Jam TD
description:
Waves of enemies will start coming and you must stop them from reaching the end. Place towers with the bottom-left buttons and destroy enemies to get more money. The gun tower is a standard tower with shorter range and a decent rate of fire. The rocket tower fires projectiles with an area-of-effect splash damage. The sniper tower fires more slowly but can shoot anything on the map. 

I wasn't able to add as many effects or polish as I would like but I'm happy with what I made in a week.
